ingredients: 4 cups water, 1 cup white sugar, 2 tablespoons honey, 1  vanilla bean, split lengthwise, 1  cinnamon stick, 5 pods cardamom, crushed, 4  Conference pears - peeled, halved, and cored
nutrition: Total Fat 24g 31%, Saturated Fat 14g 69%, Cholesterol 104mg 35%, Sodium 171mg 7%, Total Carbohydrate 94g 34%, Dietary Fiber 4g 15%, Total Sugars 66g, Protein 9g, Vitamin C 5mg 23%, Calcium 79mg 6%, Iron 2mg 13%, Potassium 330mg 7%
